tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InfluencerContent (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE influencer_content (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id INT,
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  content_description TEXT,
  post_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE brand_marketing_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_id INT,
  strategy_type VARCHAR(50),
  strategy_description TEXT,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    brand_id INT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    content_url VARCHAR(255),
    posted_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Influencer (influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
               influencer_followers INT,
               influencer_type VARCHAR(50) )

CREATE TABLE Brand (brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
       brand_name VARCHAR(255),
       industry VARCHAR(100) )

CREATE TABLE Content (content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
        content_text TEXT,
        post_date DATE,
        influencer_id INT,
        brand_id INT,
        FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES Influencer(influencer_id),
        FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES Brand(brand_id) )

CREATE TABLE Campaign (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
         campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
         start_date DATE,
         end_date DATE,
         brand_id INT,
         FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES Brand(brand_id) )

CREATE TABLE Analytics (analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
          content_id INT,
          views INT,
          likes INT,
          shares INT,
          FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES Content(content_id) )
